text:
@SecPompeo @realDonaldTrump
After 9/11 terror attacks President Bush said
'You are either with us or against us'

This is the right time after the @globaltimesnews China virus COVID19 attack on the whole world.

This question should be asked to the whole world's
EITHER WITH US OR AGAINST US
